name: Future Sight
description:
Movement:

- Use WASD to move

- Aim with the mouse

- Left click to fire

- Space to jump and double jump

Ammo:

- Shots consume ammo

- When you're below 50%, you will overheat and shots will get faster

- When you run out, you will automatically reload

- Right click when the ammo bar is in the center after emptying your clip to reload back into overheat

Score:

- Each kill will give you points

- Kill streaks award a multiplier

- Don't stop shooting and go for a high score!
